Methods in mas.display.ontology that return Position

          Gets the objects center Position, * i.e. the distance from the objects center to the root playgrounds top left corner * @return The object's center position

 Position AbstractObject.getLocalPosition()
          Gets the objects local Position * i.e. the distance from the objects top left corner to its parent's top left corner * @return The object's local position
